title: Week 8 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 10/25)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 8 gambling advice, covering all 13 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Browns-Patriots (4:30), Panthers-49ers (12:15), Eagles-Bills (15:25), Cardinals-Saints (18:00), Chargers-Bears (21:40), Giants-Lions (25:30), Raiders-Texans (30:30), Bucs-Titans (39;10), Seahawks-Falcons (42:20), Jets-Jags (47:40), Bengals-Rams (49:55), Broncos-Colts (51:10), Packers-Chiefs (55:00) and Dolphins-Steelers (57:55). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
